actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend section 133 (e) of the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 in order to provide for individual views in Senate committee reports in lieu of supplemental views.

summary.text: Amends the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 in order to provide for individual views in Senate committee reports in lieu of supplemental views.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 133 (e) of the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 in order to provide for individual views in Senate committee reports in lieu of supplemental views.
